pages.text: Wisteria is a new wood type that spawns in the $(l:contentcraft:biomes/wisteria_grove)Wisteria Grove$(). All Wisteria blocks are in a tag called 'repellent_blocks' and as the name suggests, hostile mobs are repelled from any block in this tag. This was inspired by Demon Slayer and how demons are afraid of wisteria.$(br2)
